get.description: Retrieves the list of public dashboards for the current user.

200.description: List of public dashboards was retrieved successfully.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

get.description: Retrieves a list of favorite dashboards for the current user.

200.description: List of favorite dashboards was retrieved successfully.

put.description: Users who have read access to the dashboard can update the dashboard as favorite or non-favorite.

requestBody.description: Favorite value passed will be updated to the specified dashboard.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

post.description:
Users who have read access to the dashboard can export the dashboard to the export types (Excel, PDF, and Image) and get the exported dashboard as an array of bytes in response.

When exporting multi-tabbed dashboard in image format, the response bytes must be saved in ZIP format.

requestBody.description: Details about the dashboard passed will be exported.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid.

get.description: Retrieves the respective list of items for the item types (Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule) for the current user.

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description:
Item type.
(Values allowed are Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule)

200.description: List of items has been retrieved successfully.

get.description: Retrieves the respective item detail for the current users’ item types (Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule).

delete.description: Users who have delete access to the item types Category, Dashboard, Datasource, and Schedule can delete the item by providing the item ID (Category Id, Dashboard Id, Datasource Id, and Schedule Id).

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid.

get.summary: Get a User by Email or Username

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Username or email address of the user

get.description: Retrieves the list of group details of the particular user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID or Email address of the user.

200.description: List of user's groups has been retrieved successfully.

get.description: Download the CSV template to import the CSV users.

417.description: Failed to download CSV template file.

post.description: Add the list of users using the CSV file.

requestBody.description: Details passed to add the CSV of users.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

get.description: Retrieves the list of group details.

200.description: List of groups has been retrieved successfully.

post.description: Adds the list of users to the particular group.

200.description: User(s) added to the group successfully.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

417.description: Failed to add user in to group.

delete.description: Deletes the list of users from the particular group.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

417.description: Failed to delete user from group.

post.description:
Administrators can add a new permission to the specific user by providing permission details.

To add a specific permission, you must provide the item ID (Category Id, Schedule Id, and Dashboard Id) for the permission entity (SpecificCategory, SpecificSchedule, and SpecificDashboard).

requestBody.description: Details about the permissions passed will be added to specified user id.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid.

get.description: Administrators can get the list of permissions of the specific user.

200.description: List of user permissions has been retrieved successfully.

delete.description: Administrators can delete the specific user's permission.

post.description:
Administrators can add a new permission to the specific group by providing permission details.

To add a specific permission, you must provide the item ID (Category Id, Schedule Id, and Dashboard Id) for the permission entity (SpecificCategory, SpecificSchedule, and SpecificDashboard).

requestBody.description: Details about the permissions passed will be added to specified group id.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid.

get.description: Administrators can get the list of permissions of the specific group.

200.description: List of group permissions has been retrieved successfully.

delete.description: Administrators can delete the specific group permission.

post.description: Users who have a create access for categories, can add a new category.

requestBody.description: Details about the passed category will be added.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid.

put.description: Users who have write access for categories can update an existing category.

requestBody.description: Details about the passed category will be updated to the specified category id.

400.description: The content of the request body is missing or incomplete.

406.description: The content of the request body is invalid.

token_type.description: Type of token assigned by the authorization server.

expires_in.description: The lifetime in seconds of the access token.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

Message.description: Returns the message from the API.

Email.description: Email address of the user (Email required only in [Email required](/embedded-bi/site-administration/account-settings/#email-required) mode).

Password.description: Password of the user (Password accepted only in [Automatic activation](/embedded-bi/site-administration/account-settings/#automatic-activation) mode).

IsActive.description: Returns true, if the user is an active user

UserStatus.description: Returns the status of the user

IsAzureAdUser.description: Returns true, if the user is added from Azure Active Directory.

UserDomain.description: Domain of the Active Directory User

MultiTabDashboardId.description: Specifies the dashboard ID of the multi-tabbed dashboard.

DashboardId.description: Specifies the dashboard ID of the tab.

Name.description: Specifies the name of the tab.

CreatedDate.description: Date created of the item in string format.

ModifiedDate.description: Date modified of the item in string format.

IsAzureADGroup.description: Returns true, if the group is added from Azure Active Directory.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

FileContent.description: Returns CSV file in array of bytes.

ApiDownloadCsvTemplate.description: Contains response of downloaded CSV template file.

CsvFileContent.description: Provides the CSV file in an array of bytes.

ApiStatus.description: Returns the status of the API.

Status.description: Returns status of the API request.

StatusMessage.description: Returns the status message from the API.

CsvErrorContent.description: Returns CSV file in array of bytes if the importing users find errors.

ApiCsvUserImportResponse.description: Contains response of Csv user import

PermissionAccess.description:
Specify an access type for item.
Values allowed are Create, Read, ReadWrite, ReadWriteDelete

PermissionEntity.description:
Specify an entity of item for permission.
Values allowed are AllCategories, SpecificCategory, AllSchedules, SpecificSchedule, AllDashboards, DashboardsInCategory, SpecificDashboard

PermissionAccess.description:
Specify an access type for item.
Values allowed are Create, Read, ReadWrite, ReadWriteDelete

PermissionEntity.description:
